summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Trophy Wife Cosmetics Lipstick - Semi Matte - Natural, Vegan & Cruelty Free Anna
Review Date: 2019/09/13
Store: Trophy Wife
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Trophy Wife', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Semi-Matte, Glossy', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Shine,Moisturizing,Clean,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '3.1 x 1 x 1 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '670924966586'}
Review Text: I am in love with this lipstick! The packaging looks luxurious to me and really stands out from my collection. I went with this shade which is a bright red with orange tones. It just goes with everything I wear and surprisingly my hair color at the moment. I also like how versatile this is so I can dress up or down with this color. It is 100% vegan, made with plant based wax and other natural ingredients like candelilla wax, castor seed oil, shea butter, almond oil, grape seed oil, jojoba, and coconut oil. The lipstick feels very smooth when applying and it I didn’t need a liner. And I think I reapplied when I remembered to after 3 hours and held up fine without any chapping or colorless patches. This is cruelty-free too!
Review Title: Favorite new lipstick
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Catrice | SUNGASM Luminizing Bronzer 01 | For A Sun-Kissed Shimmery Finish | Highly Pigmented & Blendable | Vegan, Paraben Free, Oil Free | Cruelty Free
Review Date: 2020/07/31
Store: Catrice
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Brand': 'Catrice', 'Color': 'C01 Golden Ecstasy', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Product Dimensions': '2.72 x 2.72 x 0.51 inches; 1.27 Ounces'}
Review Text: It’s such a beautiful warm bronzer! Great for the summertime to get that golden goddess glow. I love the embossing and the packaging is very compacted. It’s lightweight and I can throw it into my bag to carry it with me.
Review Title: Luminous Bronzer
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: C'est Moi Gentle Cleansing Water | Gentle, Fragrance-Free Cleanser Removes Makeup and Refreshes Skin, Made with Cornflower Water, Aloe Vera, and Strawberry, Kiwi, and Apple Extracts | 5.9 fl oz.
Review Date: 2020/08/05
Store: C'est Moi
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,Sensitive', 'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Scent': 'Kiwi, Strawberry, Unscented, Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '1.84 x 1.84 x 6.06 inches; 7.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '039897626055'}
Review Text: Not bad for gentle cleansing water. I was able to remove a lot of impurities and not irritate my dry sensitive skin. However, it's soap-free but when I took the bottle out, it started bubbling. I think you can see them in my picture. And it felt like a lightweight liquid soap. I double cleanse so it doesn't matter if there is residue but I don't think I wouldn’t leave it on without rinsing after. It's still really good cleansing water for the price point!
Review Title: Gentle Cleansing Water Indeed
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Caudalie Favorites Set
Review Date: 2020/08/07
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.54 x 2.05 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2346203'}
Review Text: If you never tried this brand before, this is the best way to give their popular products a try. It came with a beautiful bag and  5 different skincare products, a cleanser, serum, moisturizer, eye cream, and a mist! They all basically promote different skin issues but for the most part targets fine lines, wrinkles, aging spots, and improve dull-looking skin. Everything here works well together but can be used separately as well depending on your skincare routine. So happy with this set!
Review Title: Caudalie Bestseller Travel Kit
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: C'est Moi Vanilla Vibes Sugar Balm Body Scrub | Invigorating & Hydrating Exfoliant, Clinically Tested Non-Toxic Ingredients feat. Organic Shea Butter, Coconut Oil & Avocado Oil, EWG Verified, 6 oz
Review Date: 2021/05/03
Store: C'est Moi
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sugar', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 3.5 x 2 inches; 6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'PR-COM-RT-X994317', 'UPC': '039897302607'}
Review Text: Scrubbing away dead cell skin with this sugar balm scrub felt good! It is formulated with organic sugar, shea butter, coconut and avocado oils to gentle slough away body built up. It’s a wet sugary consistency that is easy to scrub all over. The rinsing does take a little bit of time to fully get all the residue off. Unlike dry scrub, it does not make a mess in the shower. It smells good and leaves my skin looking glowy!
Review Title: Vanilla Sugar Scrub
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Moist Toilet Wipes, Septic and Sewer Safe 4packs
Review Date: 2022/02/17
Store: Baskrean
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Baskrean', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '187.00 Count', 'Item Form': 'Wipes', 'UPC': '770807392133'}
Review Text: It’s good to have. My Bf likes having this around. We can travel with it and leave it in the bathroom to use when needed. The packaging is simple and not outrageous or obvious. And it's flushable and safe.
Review Title: GREAT MOIST WIPES
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Summer's Eve Spa Set for Women | Gift Box | Women's Post Shave Hydrating Serum, 1oz Tube | Cleansing Feminine Wash, 12oz Bottle
Review Date: 2022/09/02
Store: Summer's Eve
Product Description: ["Give a special someone or pamper yourself and experience Daily Intimate Beauty with the Summer's Eve Spa gift set containing a Luxurious Cleansing Wash and an Intimate Serum. The Summer's Eve Spa Luxurious Cleansing Wash has a calming chamomile fragrance blended with essential oils. The creamy, pearly feminine wash is hypoallergenic and gynecologist tested, safe and gentle enough to use every day. Free from dyes and parabens, the wash cleanses and leaves the skin feeling pampered. Indulge in relaxation and renewal every day. The Summer's Eve Spa after shave Skin Serum was created for your most delicate intimate areas to comfortably hydrate, smooth and soften. Specifically designed to soothe delicate, freshly shaven or waxed intimate skin. 9 out of 10 women say the serum soothed skin after shaving. The serum is infused with vitamin E, coconut oil and aloe. Elevate your intimate care routine with the cleansing wash and luxurious serum from our Summer’s Eve Spa Kit for Women Gift Set."]
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Scent': 'Spa', 'Brand': "Summer's Eve", 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Active Ingredients': 'Lactic_acid', 'Product Dimensions': '8.87 x 2.22 x 9.32 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'UPC': '041608002324', 'Manufacturer': 'Prestige Consumer Healthcare', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
Review Text: Summer’s Eve has the best feminine wash and scent. This one has a shimmer I didn't need but it’s pretty to look at. The creamy texture is amazing. I did like the camomile scent. The hydrating serum was not good at all. It comes in a squeeze tube but the serum ball up badly while applying it. Even when I use a thin layer, it doesn't spread. I would only recommend the wash.
Review Title: FEMININE WASH & HYDRATING SERUM
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Vegan & Cruelty-Free**: Consistent purchase of cosmetics and skincare products that emphasize vegan and cruelty-free formulations. 
- **Skincare Focus**: High engagement with skincare products, particularly gentle cleansers and body scrubs that are sensitive-skin friendly.
- **Luxurious Packaging**: A tendency to favor products with appealing, upscale packaging, indicative of a preference for aesthetic presentation.
- **Versatile Makeup**: Preferences shown for versatile makeup items that can transition from casual to formal settings.
- **Natural Ingredients**: Strong inclination towards products made with natural ingredients, prioritizing health-conscious choices in beauty routines.
- **Lightweight & Travel-Friendly**: Favoring compact and easy-to-carry products, suggesting a lifestyle of convenience and practicality.
- **Sun-Kissed Glow**: Attraction to products that enhance or mimic sun-kissed skin, indicating a desire for a healthy, radiant appearance.
- **Effective Cleansing Rituals**: Emphasis on cleansing rituals, with products specifically tailored for sensitive skin and effective makeup removal.
- **Critical Reviews**: Willingness to critique ingredients and textures in products, especially expressing disappointment in specific performance aspects, as noted with certain serums. 

Overall, this consumer demonstrates a thoughtful approach to beauty, focusing on quality, ethics, and skin health.

target_interaction.title: STURDY LARGE HAIR CLIPS 9CT
target_interaction.text: Okay, I'm totally digging these hair clips. I've tried a lot and they would be durable only at first use and after they start falling apart. But these particular clips were ultra sturdy. I use it while working out and it just stayed in tack. Also, when I lean on my back and my head weight is on it as I do chest presses, I thought it would break. And it didn't. Definitely the clips I gravitate towards. And the neutral color goes with everything.
target_interaction.title_meta: 9Count 4.3In Big Hair Claw Clips Neutral Colors Hair Clips For Women Claws Clips For Thick Hair Banana Clips Medium Large Hair Claws Square Strong Hold Hair Styling Accessories For Girls
